Content: I like this app normally. But the last three months it has been crashing so much. I submit help requests and get no response. Anyone else?
Dead simple. It's very clean and easy to use. Also very stable, didn't have a single crash/bug experience so far.

I've been using this app for the last 2 years for tracking my studies. Never had any need to look for something else. It never crashed, and had no problem using it on multiple devices. Would definitely recommend for anyone that's looking for a simple time tracker.

Way better than TouchTime. Does not crash randomly like TouchTime. User can adjust icons in desired order and edit icons. User can record two icons at same time (listening to music & hiking for example). User can set theoretical goals to compare to actuality of how they spend their time.
Great Used it for a few days, no crashes. Works really well even on double tasks. Goals help with daily motivation. Fantastic app.
Crash again and again Impossible to use! Note 2 Android 4.3
Unstable Causes NVIDIA shield tablet to crash/lock when unlocking. May involve power control
